## ‚≠ê Znaƒçajke

## üì• Instalacija

### üîå Powercord
`git clone https://github.com/Pukimaa/phoenix-discord` u va≈°em folderu s temama

### ‚ö™ Vizality
`git clone https://github.com/Pukimaa/phoenix-discord` u va≈°em folderu s temama

### ü¶Ü GooseMod
Koristite ugradeni "duƒáan".

### üîµ BetterDiscord
1. Skinite ovaj file: https://phoenixcolors.github.io/phoenix-discord/phoenix.theme.css
2. Stavite ga u:
    - Windows: `%AppData%\betterdiscord\themes`
    - Linux: `~/.config/BetterDiscord/themes`
    - Mac: `~/Library/Application Support/betterdiscord/themes`
3. U Discord otiƒëite u `Korisnicke Postavke > Themes/Theme` i aktivirajte *Phoenix*

## Ô∏èÔ∏èÔ∏è‚ù§Ô∏è Zasluge
